widgets.title: No. Docker Hosts
widgets.nrql: SELECT uniqueCount(Hostname) AS 'Hosts' FROM dockerContainerEvent SINCE 1 minute ago

widgets.title: Docker Host CPU % by Host
widgets.nrql: SELECT latest(HostCPUPerc) AS `CPU %` FROM dockerContainerEvent TIMESERIES FACET Hostname SINCE 30 minutes ago

widgets.title: Docker Host Memory % by Host
widgets.nrql: SELECT latest(HostMemUsedPerc) AS `MemUsed %` FROM dockerContainerEvent TIMESERIES FACET Hostname SINCE 30 minutes ago

widgets.title: No. Containers
widgets.nrql: SELECT uniqueCount(ID) AS 'Containers' FROM dockerContainerEvent SINCE 1 minute ago

widgets.title: Container CPU Usage % - By Host,ImageID
widgets.nrql: SELECT latest(CPUPercent) AS `CPU %` FROM dockerContainerEvent TIMESERIES FACET Hostname,IDShort  SINCE 30 minutes ago

widgets.title: Container Memory Usage % - By Host,ImageID
widgets.nrql: SELECT latest(Mem)  FROM dockerContainerEvent TIMESERIES FACET Hostname,IDShort  SINCE 30 minutes ago

widgets.title: Docker Stats by ID,Hostname
widgets.nrql: SELECT latest(Image), latest(State), latest(CPUPercent) AS `CPU%`, latest(Mem/1024/1024) AS `Mem MB`, latest(BlkRead/1024/1024) AS `BlkReadMB`, latest(BlkWrite/1024/1024) AS `BlkWriteMB`, latest(NetRx/1024/1024) AS 'NetRxMB', latest(NetTx/1024/1024) AS 'NetTxMB' FROM dockerContainerEvent FACET IDShort, Hostname  SINCE 1 minute ago
